where can i get the norwegian subtitles? i like to watch norwegian movies with norwegian subtitles thats the way i learn the language :P

why do people hardcode subs? Is is because they don't know how to use softsubs, or because they don't want people to download their rips? it makes no sense what so ever. Hardcoding of subs has ruined rips for countless people who don't speak the sub language, yet would still like to see the film. If you want to contribute and upload a film, then why on earth would you want to ruin the quality? When we have perfectly usable option of softcoding, there is absolutley no reason to hardcode. STOP DOING IT!
/rant over
Saw this movie at the cinema when it came out. Not that good, but without ruining it for the rest of you guys, I'm downloading this solely for some epic scenes at the end! :P
